biogs.title: Location: Tradewinds Hotel, Fremantle, Western Australia, Apr 7-10 2025
biogs.information: On behalf of the Loop 3D Foundation and the Loop platform, we will organise a conference on 3D geological modelling to discuss current and future workflows, approaches and applications, and unsolved challenges of 3D geological modelling at all scales
biogs.sub_info:
The conference will run in person over Tue 8th and Wed 9th April.
A series of half-day workshops will be organised on Mon 7th and Thu 10th April

biogs.title: Scientific themes:
biogs.information:
• 3D geological modelling methods
• Integration with geophysical interpretation and modelling
• Applications to resources management (water, minerals, tailings)
• Applications to minerals exploration

biogs.title: Abstracts submission - Deadline: Dec 15, 2024
biogs.information: We welcome abstracts from 3D practioners and method developers from industry, academia and government organisations related to 3D geological modelling in general and highlighting current practices, applications and challenges
biogs.sub_info:
Presenters must attend the conference in person and be registered. There is no abstract submission fee
Please use this abstract template and submit your abstract here before Dec 15, 2024
Alternatively, if you do not have a gmail email account, please email your abstract to: loop3d DOT foundation AT gmail DOT com

biogs.title: Registration
biogs.information: Registration information - Watch this space for a link to our secure registration partner
biogs.sub_info:
Registration costs are capped at AUD$1000
Registration to the workshops requires registration to the conference and will be confirmed on a first-in first-served basis

Delegate (2 days conference) AUD$750
Delegate Early Bird (prior to Dec 15th)AUD$680
Student DelegateAUD$350
Each workshop (half-day)AUD$200
Still to come - Link to registration page
Cancellation policy

biogs.title: Accommodation
biogs.information: We are pleased to inform you that delegates can enjoy a special rate at the Tradewinds Hotel using the promo code: LOOP2025
biogs.sub_info: Please enter this code when booking online at Tradewinds Hotel

information:

biogs.title: Partner organisations
biogs.information: Loop is joint initiative supported by the ARC Linkage program and the MinEx CRC. We gratefully thank the below organisations for their continued trust, support and contributions to R&D
